prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, Drums, Bass, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, Drums, and Bass, but no Brass.

Style 2:

Style 3:
